          <p>
           <img alt="Shapes Day Nursery" height="252" src="/images/header_home.jpg" width="899"/>
          </p>
          <h1 style="font-family: 'Conv_GOODDP',Sans-Serif;">
           Welcome to Shapes Day Nursery
          </h1>
          <p>
           Shapes Day Nursery, Reigate, first opened in May 2011, followed by Shapes Day Nursery, Epsom in April 2016, We offer professional and high standards in care and education, in a warm, caring, learning environment in which children can learn, develop and discover new and exciting experiences.
          </p>
          <p>
           We have two uniquely designed, renovated buildings with three main areas for preschool, nursery and toddler-aged children, as well as separate baby centres.
          </p>
          <p>
           <img alt="Sue Richards" class="float-left" height="120" src="/images/sue_richards.jpg" style="margin: 5px 10px 10px 0px; padding: 8px; outline: 0px; background: #fafafa; border: 1px solid #dcdcdc; float: left;" width="100"/>
          </p>
          <p>
           Shapes Day Nursery owner Sue Richards' previous experience in providing high quality childcare includes working in childcare for over 30 years, setting up and establishing two previous nurseries, one of which achieved an outstanding award in May 2010.
          </p>
          <p>
           We have a qualified and experienced staff team who are committed to ensuring that every child is given the opportunity to develop as an individual to enable and encourage them to reach their full potential through praise, respect and positive attitudes.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Shapes Day Nursery, Reigate, has been awarded Outstanding in a recent OFSTED inspection (July 2017). You can read the full report here:
           <a href="https://reports.ofsted.gov.uk/provider/files/2718747/urn/EY423146.pdf">
            https://reports.ofsted.gov.uk/provider/files/2718747/urn/EY423146.pdf
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <span style="color: #548dd4; font-family: 'Calibri',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-ansi-language: EN-GB; mso-fareast-language: EN-GB; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA;">
            <img alt="cid:image003.png@01D38531.2CA07000" border="0" height="89" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 0.916in; height: 0.927in; margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; display: block;" width="88"/>
           </span>
          </p>
          <blockquote style="margin: 15px 10px; padding: 10px 10px 10px 35px; outline: 0px; border: 1px solid #daf1fc; font-size: 1.5em; line-height: 1.5em; font-style: italic; font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; color: #666666; background-color: #daf1fc; background-image: url('/images/quote.jpg'); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: 10px 10px;">
           <p style="margin: 0px; padding: 10px; outline: 0px;">
            For full details about the care we provide or to make an appointment to view either nursery, please call us at Reigate on 01737 221441, or Epsom on 01372 877863.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="https://www.google.co.uk/maps/place/Lynn+Walk,+Reigate+RH2+7NZ/@51.2212725,-0.1990755,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x4875e4d7e2a606b9:0x3bd40209e2f05e73!8m2!3d51.2211586!4d-0.196959">

           </a>
